This is a pre-release version, expect many bugs, crashes and missing features.
To install place the `zzre` folder *next* to the `ZanZarah/System` folder.
Confirm this structure:
```
zanzarah
  - Save
  - Data
    - _fb0x00.fbs
  - Resources
    - DATA_0.PAK
  - System
    - zanzarah.exe
  - zzre
    - zzre.exe
```

Then start `zzre.exe`
